text: Hi there, Brian. It's time for our performance review. How's everything going? Things are going well. Last week, I worked on improving our project's documentation. I updated the user manual and added some FAQs based on customer feedback. I also attended the customer support training session. It helped me to understand the issues our customers are facing, and I learned some strategies for better addressing their concerns. Excellent. Learning more about our customers is essential. I appreciate your dedication. Can you tell me about your long-term goals? Of course. By the end of the quarter, I plan to have the documentation I'm working on fully updated, and I intend to improve our customer support process based on the training I received. It sounds like you're on the right track. Keep up the good work, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any support. Thanks, Maria. I appreciate your guidance.
